mosinstall.name: Image Manager
mosinstall.author: Ryan Demmer
mosinstall.description:
Image Manager 1.1.2

Changelog (from 1.1.2):

  • Fixed: Align default setting bug

Changelog (from 1.1.1):

  • Fixed: Align bug - #4786.
  • Added: New border options/functionality.
  • Added: JCE Tooltip class to class list.

Changelog (from 1.1.0 beta 2):

  • API updates/changes
  • General bug fixes

Changelog (from 1.1.0 beta):

  • Added functions to support new ajax routines
  • Changed max file size to Kb instead of Mb

param.name: dir
param.label: Image Directory Path
param.description: Path to image directory.

param.name: url
param.label: Image Directory URL
param.description: URL to image directory.

param.name: create_folder
param.label: Create Image Directory
param.description: Creates the above Image Directory on first load if it does not exist.

param.name: use_tree
param.label: Show Folder Tree
param.description: Enable/Disable Folder Tree View.

param.name: max_size
param.label: Upload Max File Size (Kb)
param.description: Maximum file size for uploaded files.

param.name: hspace
param.label: Default HSpace value
param.description: Default HSpace value

param.name: vspace
param.label: Default VSpace value
param.description: Default VSpace value

param.name: border
param.label: Border On
param.description: Border on by default

param.name: border_width
param.label: Border Width
param.description: Default border width.

param.name: border_style
param.label: Border Style
param.description: Default border style.

param.name: border_color
param.label: Border Color
param.description: Default border color.

param.name: align
param.label: Default Align value
param.description: Default Align value

param.name: upload
param.label: Allow Upload
param.description: Select access level to allow Uploads

param.name: folder_new
param.label: Allow Folder Create
param.description: Select access level to allow Folder Create

param.name: folder_delete
param.label: Allow Folder Delete
param.description: Select access level to allow Folder Delete

param.name: folder_rename
param.label: Allow Folder Rename
param.description: Select access level to allow Folder Renaming

param.name: file_delete
param.label: Allow Image Deleteing
param.description: Select access level to allow Image Deleting

param.name: file_rename
param.label: Allow Image Renaming
param.description: Select access level to allow Image Renaming

param.name: file_move
param.label: Allow Image Cut/Copy/Paste
param.description: Select access level to allow Image Cut/Copy/Paste

param.name: user_dir
param.label: Use Usertype/Username Access
param.description: Restrict users to specific directories based on their access level.

param.name: dir_type
param.label: Restriction Type
param.description: Select folder restriction type. 'Usertype' - restrict the user to a directory based on their usertype. 'Username' - restrict the user to a directory based on their username. 'Usertype/Username' - a combination of the former two. 'Folder' - restrict users to a folder named in the field below.

param.name: user_folder
param.label: User Directory
param.description: Name of user folder if 'folder' option in 'Restriction Type' above is selected.

param.name: user_dir_level
param.label: Restriction Level
param.description: Level below which users are assigned a folder based on the selection above.
